author: andyc
msg: Updated entity scanner API. Made the following changes:
change: scanContent, scanAttContent, scanData to return
the next character. This removes the need to
immediately do a peekChar when they return.
added: skipChar. Now you don't have to do a peekChar
followed by a scanChar just to consume an
I'll update the design.html and .zip files later.
